exercises.name: Shoulder relaxation
exercises.instructions: Raise your shoulders toward your ears, hold for 2 seconds, then slowly release.

exercises.name: Neck stretching
exercises.instructions: Slowly tilt your head from one side to the other, holding each position for 5 seconds.

journalPre.prompt: Write what is troubling you and what you can do to let go of that tension. (This will help evaluate the benefit at the end of the session and track progress over time!)

journalPost.prompt: Write how you feel now after this session. Help us make the experience even more suited to your situation.

spiritual.text: A calm heart gives life to the body...

environment.suggestion: Find a quiet place, dim the lights, close your eyes if you can, and listen to these sounds with headphones to better immerse yourself in the atmosphere.

steps.situation: You're about to start an important task but feel overwhelmed by the noise around you.

options.text: I put on relaxing music and take deep breaths.
I complain about the noise and lose focus.
I wait for the noise to end while scrolling on Instagram.

feedback.correct: Great choice. You are taking control of your mental space.
feedback.wrong: Understandable, but you have better tools to regain calm.

steps.situation: You realize you're breathing shallow and tense.

options.text: I sit down and take 3 mindful deep breaths.
I ignore the feeling and carry on as if nothing is wrong.

feedback.correct: Excellent. Your breath is your first ally.
feedback.wrong: Ignoring your body won't lead to calm. Take a moment.
